name: Furry Hentai Quest
description:
The world of Klytoria is in danger! Will you be able to make it far away enough from the castle? Using your choice of Hentai, Furry, or human characters you must eschew obstacles and carefully navigate the lands...

Can you save Klytoria?



Run, crouch, jump and maneuver yourself around the land to get as FAR away as FAST as you can from the ill-fated castle located at the heart of Klytoria.
This "story-based" platformer game will leave your jaw on the floor as you struggle to keep your hands on the keyboard.
